overview:
An experienced professional and innovative thinker with 5+ years experience in BTL, Direct and Digital marketing (that means he can reach your clients directly!). He always has creative solutions to problems than others choose to go the traditional route.

An intellectually curious and tech-savvy self-starter has proven experience on developing and execute successful on and off line marketing campaigns with experience in implementing and analysing best practices and key performance targets. Skilled at planing, prioritising and executing simultaneous projects and activities.

Biggest hobby and passion for Online projects has given technical experience and understanding of programming languages ( css, html, php, mysql ), Content Management System management ( Wordpress, Tomato cart, Open cart, Prestashop ) and graphic/web design (Adobe Photoshop).
